channel.title: A 508 source + client
channel.description:
Hey Moparians, I was wondering if someone had a blank 508 source. With this I mean a server without skills and without customs etc. A decent combat would be nice as i want to aim for a Pking based server (skilling and PVM would be something for later on).
If so, what would be better to use though? Palidino76 or bulby? Or is there maybe another 508 base I never heard of before?
So what I`m basicly asking: A clean 508, with combat PVP/PVM, PvM does not have to be complex yet as I want to learn from this project aswell, without skills(or a few), and without customs. I want to rise 508`s back from the dead and try to make people love 508`s again.
Edit: I think it would be better to say that I`m looking for a Semi blank server, hehe
Thanks Already.
